arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the DataSync Location.

mountOptions.description: Configuration block containing mount options used by DataSync to access the NFS Server.

onPremConfig.description: Configuration block containing information for connecting to the NFS File System.

serverHostname.description: Specifies the IP address or DNS name of the NFS server. The DataSync Agent(s) use this to mount the NFS server.

subdirectory.description: Subdirectory to perform actions as source or destination. Should be exported by the NFS server.

tags.description: Key-value pairs of resource tags to assign to the DataSync Location. .If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering NfsLocation resources.
